overview: Kevin Akeroyd is responsible for Sales, Business Development, Data Services, and Jigsaw Support. Before Jigsaw, Kevin held VP positions at large public companies such as Acxiom Digital (previously Digital Impact) and RR Donnelley & Sons Company. He also held President and CEO positions at several start-ups. These included Gallery Player, Inc. and The Loan Page, Inc. Kevin graduated from the Stanford Executive Program for Strategy and Organization and has a degree in Business Administration from the University of Washington.
